values.description: Stop limit orders are instructions to place a limit order once an asset passes a specific price level. They are similar to stop market orders.
values.keywords: stop limit orders, stop market orders, market orders, orders to buy breakouts, marketable limit price, unmarketable limit price, stop price, order ticket, update orders
values.og:description: Stop limit orders are instructions to place a limit order once an asset passes a specific price level. They are similar to stop market orders.
